topic.title: HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE IN CENTIMETRES (AT TWO YEAR NEONATAL OUTCOMES ASSESSMENT)
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment, where the Head Circumference measurement was not taken on the TWO YEAR NEONATAL OUTCOMES ASSESSMENT DATE, the actual OBSERVATION DATE (HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE) should be recorded.
